channel.title: Poems on Literacy is a Curse
channel.description: Recent content in Poems on Literacy is a Curse

item.title: Icons for Heroes
item.description:
Whether Spartan or Trojan,
Montgomery or Rommel,
Union or Confederate,
We will withhold judgment

item.title: Regression
item.description:
The colonizer was the adult.

A flurry of invention
Novelty run amok
He stood astride the continent
Leaving a rock-solid foundation for child-scholars
He learned at home and taught abroad
Mastery embodied
